subdisciplines.name: Audio Production
subdisciplines.description: The creation and manipulation of sound for media projects such as film, television, and music.

subdisciplines.name: Video Production
subdisciplines.description: The process of creating video content for television, film, or online distribution.

subdisciplines.name: Interactive Media Production
subdisciplines.description: The creation and design of interactive media projects, such as video games, websites, and mobile applications.
